SelectedDatabase.title: Please select a database
SelectedDatabase.description: You need to select a database as the container for storing data

MultipleDatabases.title: Select multiple databases
MultipleDatabases.description: You have authorized multiple databases, please select one as the container for storing data

NoDatabase.title: No database
NoDatabase.description: You have not authorized any databases, please reauthorize

SingleDatabase.title: Authorization successful
SingleDatabase.description: You have authorized a database, it will be used as the default container for storing data
